summary:
Started a new game and just want all the artifacts and weapons?

Get all the artifacts without going through all the troubles of the quests.
descriptionHtml:
Hey

Easy and simple mod.

Adds a barrel to dragonsreach when you first enter to the right you wont miss it.

It is labled as chest of daedra and you can access ALL the daedric artifacts there including the items only available via that quest such as the books notes and the things you usually have to choose between.

Whether you are looking for both the azura stars or the whole lot of them you came to the right place.

INSTALL:

Just click download with manager.

OR:

Drag esp file into your data file.

HOW TO FIND DATA FILE EASY AND SIMPLE:

Go to steam > library > Syrim > right click > Browse local cache
author: TheChode1
